title: 1987년 Foulk 사건
summary: 미국 Missouri, MO 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Foulk. 판결일: 1987-01-13. 법원: Missouri Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STATE of Missouri, Plaintiff-Respondent, v. Robert W. FOULK, Defendant-Appellant
**판결일**: 1987-01-13
**법원**: Missouri Court of Appeals
**관할**: Missouri, MO

**판사**: Gaertner, Gary, Karohl, Simon

## 변호인

William L. Webster, Atty. Gen., Paul LaRose, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for plaintiff-respondent., Daniel J. Pingelton, Columbia, for defendant-appellant.

## 인용

- 725 S.W.2d 56

## 판결문 요약


725 S.W.2d 56 (1987)
STATE of Missouri, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Robert W. FOULK, Defendant-Appellant.
No. 49624.
Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, Division Three.
January 13, 1987.
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer Denied March 4, 1987.
Application to Transfer Denied May 19, 1987.
*59 William L. Webster, Atty. Gen., Paul LaRose, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for plaintiff-respondent.
Daniel J. Pingelton, Columbia, for defendant-appellant.
SIMON, Judge.
Defendant, Robert W. Foulk, was found guilty of rape, § 566.030 RSMo 1978 and sodomy, § 566.060 RSMo 1978, at the conclusion of a jury trial in the Circuit Court of Cape Girardeau County. (All further references will be to RSMo 1978 unless otherwise noted.) Pursuant to the jury's verdict, defendant was sentenced to a term of ten years for each offense to be served consecutively.
*60 Defendant contends the trial court erred in: (1) denying his offer of evidence of prior sexual contacts between himself and the complainant; (2) denying his motion for individual or group voir dire; (3) sustaining the state's objection to his cross-examination of a state witness concerning the complainant's reputation for truth and veracity; (4) denying his motion to endorse two defense witnesses to impeach the complaining witness; (5) sustaining state's objection to questions asked of a defense witness concerning his observations of prior injuries to complainant similar to those attributed to defendant; (6) overruling his object...
